subject: Re: [junit] hello test example - errors
msgSnippet: Your class doesn t appear to be in a package starting with the name junit . Please check the package name of your test class. ... J. B. Rainsberger,
messageBody:
Your class doesn't appear to be in a package starting with the name "junit". Please check the package name of your test class.

>So said Medlen, Jiri on 2003-05-22 --------------------
>Hello,
>
>I'm trying to organize my test cases for the example hello world, but I'm
>getting an errors.
>
>D:\CoreJavaBook>java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.hellotest.TestHelloClass
>Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
>junit/hellotest/Test
>elloClass (wrong name: hellotest/TestHelloClass)
> at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass0(Native Method)
> at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:477)
> at
>java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:1
>9)
> at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:248)
> at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$1(URLClassLoader.java:216)
> at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197)
> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:191)
> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:298)
> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:285)
> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:255)
> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:314)
> at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
> at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:124)
> at
>junit.runner.StandardTestSuiteLoader.load(StandardTestSuiteLoader.ja
>a:11)
> at
>junit.runner.BaseTestRunner.loadSuiteClass(BaseTestRunner.java:135)
> at junit.runner.BaseTestRunner.getTest(BaseTestRunner.java:32)
> at junit.textui.TestRunner.start(TestRunner.java, Compiled Code)
> at junit.textui.TestRunner.main(TestRunner.java:112)
>
>D:\CoreJavaBook>java -version
>java version "1.2.2"
>Classic VM (build JDK-1.2.2_006, native threads, symcjit)
>
>I have attached all classes
>
>Thanks,
>
>-Jiri-
>
>
>
>
>
